Rule.name: BracesForClass
Rule.Description: Checks the location of the opening brace ({) for classes. By default, requires them on the same line, but the sameLine property can be set to false to override this.

Rule.name: BracesForForLoop
Rule.Description: Checks the location of the opening brace ({) for for loops. By default, requires them on the same line, but the sameLine property can be set to false to override this.

Rule.name: BracesForIfElse
Rule.Description: Checks the location of the opening brace ({) for if statements. By default, requires them on the same line, but the sameLine property can be set to false to override this.

Rule.name: BracesForMethod
Rule.Description: Checks the location of the opening brace ({) for constructors and methods. By default, requires them on the same line, but the sameLine property can be set to false to override this.

Rule.name: BracesForTryCatchFinally
Rule.Description: Checks the location of the opening brace ({) for try statements. By default, requires them on the line, but the sameLine property can be set to false to override this.

Rule.name: Max 2 blank lines before }

Rule.name: SpaceAfterCatch
Rule.Description: Check that there is exactly one space (blank) after the catch keyword and before the opening parenthesis.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterComma
Rule.Description: Checks that there is at least one space or whitespace following each comma. That includes checks for method and closure declaration parameter lists, method call parameter lists, Map literals and List literals.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterFor
Rule.Description: Check that there is exactly one space (blank) after the for keyword and before the opening parenthesis.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterIf
Rule.Description: Check that there is exactly one space (blank) after the if keyword and before the opening parenthesis.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterSemicolon
Rule.Description: Checks that there is at least one space or whitespace following each semicolon separating multiple statements on a single line or the clauses within a classic for loop.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterSwitch
Rule.Description: Check that there is exactly one space (blank) after the switch keyword and before the opening parenthesis.

Rule.name: SpaceAfterWhile
Rule.Description: Check that there is exactly one space (blank) after the while keyword and before the opening parenthesis.

Rule.name: SpaceAroundOperator
Rule.Description: Check that there is at least one space (blank) or whitespace around each binary operator.
